actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to declare that certain federally-owned lands shall be held by the United States in trust for the Hualapi Indian Tribe, of the Hualapi Reservation, Ariz.

summary.text: Declares that the interests of the United States in the lands in the State of Arizona set aside by Executive Orders of December 22, 1898, and May 14, 1900, shall be held by the United States in trust for the Hualapai Reservation, Arizona.

titles.title: A bill to declare that certain federally-owned lands shall be held by the United States in trust for the Hualapi Indian Tribe, of the Hualapi Reservation, Ariz.
